metadata.title: CVE-2023-49288 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Squid is a caching proxy for the Web supporting HTTP, HTTPS, FTP, and more.Affected versions of squid are subject to a a Use-After-Free bug which canlead to a Denial of Service attack via collapsed forwarding. All versionsof Squid from 3.5 up to and including 5.9 configured with"collapsed_forwarding on" are vulnerable. Configurations with"collapsed_forwarding off" or without a "collapsed_forwarding" directiveare not vulnerable. This bug is fixed by Squid version 6.0.1. Users areadvised to upgrade. Users unable to upgrade should remove allcollapsed_forwarding lines from their squid.conf.

criterions.comment: squid3 package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
